mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FA_FMGK_GKQRB B WHERE B.GONGKAIR = #{gongkair} AND B.SHENQINGH IN (SELECT GG_WJ_TZSMSB.YEWUZTBH FROM GG_WJ_TZSMSB WHERE GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISLX IN ('210305', '210308') AND GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISZT = '05' AND GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISSCRQ IN (#{tongzhisscrq}))

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FA_FMGK_GKQRB WHERE FA_FMGK_GKQRB.GONGKAIR = #{gongkair} AND FA_FMGK_GKQRB.SHENQINGH NOT IN (SELECT GG_WJ_TZSMSB.YEWUZTBH FROM GG_WJ_TZSMSB WHERE GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISLX IN ('210305', '210308') AND GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISZT = '05' AND GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISSCRQ IN (#{tongzhisscrq})) AND FA_FMGK_GKQRB.SHENQINGH NOT IN (SELECT ZHU.SHENQINGH FROM GG_ZLX_ZHU ZHU WHERE SUBSTR(ZHU.ANJIANYWZT, '0', '5') = 'S1101' AND ZHU.SHENQINGH IN (SELECT FA_FMGK_GKQRB.SHENQINGH FROM FA_FMGK_GKQRB WHERE FA_FMGK_GKQRB.GONGKAIR = #{gongkair}))

SELECT SHENQINGH FROM FA_FMGK_GKQRB WHERE FA_FMGK_GKQRB.GONGKAIR = #{gongkair} AND FA_FMGK_GKQRB.SHENQINGH NOT IN (SELECT GG_WJ_TZSMSB.YEWUZTBH FROM GG_WJ_TZSMSB WHERE GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISLX IN ('210305', '210308') AND GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISZT = '05' AND GG_WJ_TZSMSB.TONGZHISSCRQ IN (#{tongzhisscrq})) AND FA_FMGK_GKQRB.SHENQINGH NOT IN (SELECT ZHU.SHENQINGH FROM GG_ZLX_ZHU ZHU WHERE SUBSTR(ZHU.ANJIANYWZT, '0', '5') = 'S1101' AND ZHU.SHENQINGH IN (SELECT FA_FMGK_GKQRB.SHENQINGH FROM FA_FMGK_GKQRB WHERE FA_FMGK_GKQRB.GONGKAIR = #{gongkair}))
